metadata.Title: CVE-2017-11692 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - low
metadata.Description:
The function "Token& Scanner::peek" in scanner.cpp in yaml-cpp 0.5.3 andearlier allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (assertionfailure and application exit) via a '!2' string.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-11692` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libyaml-cpp0.7 - 0.6.3-9
No subscription required

criterions.comment: yaml-cpp package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.6.3-9').
